meanings.definition: A small cavity within a larger cavity.
meanings.sent1: The dentist found a tiny subcavity in my tooth during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The geologist discovered a subcavity within the rock formation.
meanings.sent3: The ant made its home in the cozy subcavity of the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The hidden subcavity in the wall was a perfect spot for the spy to hide.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden in a secret subcavity beneath the castle.

meanings.definition: A depression or hollow within a structure.
meanings.sent1: Water collected in the subcavity of the sink after the faucet was left running.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed the building with a subcavity to allow for natural light.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up in the warm subcavity of the blanket.
meanings.sent4: The subcavity in the road caused a bump when driving over it.
meanings.sent5: The subcavity in the ground was a perfect hiding spot for the rabbit.
